title: The Favorites - Our Gambling Movie Pantheon
itunes:title: The Favorites - Our Gambling Movie Pantheon
description:
What are the top gambling movies of all-time? A friend of the podcast returns to help us decide. 

Michael Lasker is a true Hollywood insider, a top talent manager at Mosaic in Los Angeles and was recently named one of the 40 Most Powerful People in Comedy by the Hollywood Reporter. Most importantly, he's a huge film buff and legitimate Oscars savant. 

Along with Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter, they discuss their best and worst gambling films of all time, along with who they believe best depicted the reality of betting. Plus, Lasker sheds some light on the more obscure 1992 film Diggstown, a boxing movie that still holds up. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
